short_definition: See QUASH. A party uses it when seeking a determination that service of process was not proper and, therefore, the court has no jurisdiction over an improperly served party. It may also be used to stop execution (enforcement) of a judgment where the writ (see WRIT) of fieri facias is defective, judgment has been satisfied, etc.
